Name: Calamity Queller
Passive Ability: Extinguishing Precept Gain 12~24% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by 3.2~6.4% per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.

Name: Engulfing Lightning
Passive Ability: Timeless Dream: Eternal Stove ATK increased by 28~56% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of 80~120% ATK. Gain 30~50% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

Name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
Passive Ability: Eagle Spear of Justice On hit, increases ATK by 3.2~6.0% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12~24%.

Name: Skyward Spine
Passive Ability: Black Wing Increases CRIT Rate by 8~16% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40~100% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

Name: Staff of Homa
Passive Ability: Reckless Cinnabar HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8~1.6% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK bonus is increased by an additional 1~1.8% of Max HP.

Name: Staff of the Scarlet Sands
Passive Ability: Heat Haze at Horizon's End The equipping character gains 52~104% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. When an Elemental Skill hits opponents, the Dream of the Scarlet Sands effect will be gained for 10s: The equipping character will gain 28~56% of their Elemental Mastery as bonus ATK. Max 3 stacks.

Name: Vortex Vanquisher
Passive Ability: Golden Majesty Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Name: "The Catch"
Passive Ability: Shanty Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 16~32% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by 6~12%.

Name: Blackcliff Pole
Passive Ability: Press the Advantage After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Name: Crescent Pike
Passive Ability: Infusion Needle After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20~40% ATK as DMG for 5s.

Name: Deathmatch
Passive Ability: Gladiator If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16~32% and DEF is increased by 16~32%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24~48%.

Name: Dragon's Bane
Passive Ability: Bane of Flame and Water Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20~36%.

Name: Dragonspine Spear
Passive Ability: Frost Burial Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60~100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80~140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200~360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

Name: Favonius Lance
Passive Ability: Windfall CRIT Hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

Name: Kitain Cross Spear
Passive Ability: Samurai Conduct Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6~12%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3~5 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

Name: Lithic Spear
Passive Ability: Lithic Axiom - Unity For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7~11% ATK increase and a 3~7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

Name: Missive Windspear
Passive Ability: The Wind Unattained Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by 12~24% and Elemental Mastery is increased by 48~96.

Name: Moonpiercer
Passive Ability: Stillwood Moonshadow After triggering Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, a Leaf of Revival will be created around the character for a maximum of 10s. When picked up, the Leaf will grant the character 16~32% ATK for 12s. Only 1 Leaf can be generated this way every 20s. This effect can still be triggered if the character is not on the field.

Name: Prototype Starglitter
Passive Ability: Magic Affinity After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8~16% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

Name: Royal Spear
Passive Ability: Focus Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Name: Wavebreaker's Fin
Passive Ability: Watatsumi Wavewalker For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

Name: Black Tassel
Passive Ability: Bane of the Soft Increases DMG against slimes by 40~80%.

Name: Halberd
Passive Ability: Heavy Normal Attacks deal an additional 160~320% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Name: White Tassel
Passive Ability: Sharp Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24~48%.

Name: Iron Point
Passive Ability: None

Name: Beginner's Protector
Passive Ability: None
